message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than $80. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $95?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product sounds promising, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $85?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at $87.50. This price reflects the value of the product while keeping it accessible for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think we're getting closer. Would it be possible to lower the price to $80?
